ygData.subject: Re: Getting spells as a DE
ygData.msgSnippet: What spells are you looking for?  I m lvl 16 and haven t found any that aren t sold in neriak. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: MAD Iguana
ygData.messageBody:
What spells are you looking for? I'm lvl 16 and haven't found any that
aren't sold in neriak.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 01, 1999 12:31 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Getting spells as a DE


>From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>
>I am a dark elf wizard and if I want to buy any spells that aren't sold in
>neriak what am I supposed to do? I am under the impression that I can't go
>into any cities without being KOS except for Oggok and Grobb and I don't
>think either of those sells wizard spells. Thanks.
>
>
